script: There is a Statue of Founder in the center of my hometown.
About 3 km South of the Statue of Founder there is a Museum
Hospital is a location in my home town, it is 1 KM, West from Museum.
Library is a location in my home town, it is 3 KM, West from Hospital.
I visited Park, which is 3 KM, North from Library.
And finally there is High Street which is North from Park and 1 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from {origin} to {place} following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
(Just an example, if exact instructions are followed)
From Statue of Founder, go 3km South to Museum.
From Museum, go 1km West to Hospital.
From Hospital, go 3km West to Library.
From Library, go 3km North to Park.
From Park, go 1km North to High Street.
